Name: Ridiculousness
Title: Sterling and Lolo Wood XC
Desc: Rob, Steelo and Lolo Wood hop on some bikes but forget to "Hold That Bar."
LongDescription: Rob, Steelo and guest host Lolo Wood hop on some bikes but forget to "Hold That Bar;" they find belts for some "Pantless Playmakers", and have lunch at some scary restaurants that are "Serving Fear."
